title: The Mermaids' Tears: Oceans of Plastic

sources.title: Oceans
sources.description: An ecological drama/documentary, filmed throughout the globe. Part thriller, part meditation on the vanishing wonders of the sub-aquatic world.

metadata.Plot: Garbage is an escalating issue for today's civilization. In the oceans, waste accumulates to form gigantic floating landfills, surpassing even the largest European countries in size. Billions of bottles, shoes, and textiles meld i...
metadata.Actors: Christiana Boerger, Anna Cummins, Melanie Delia
